import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import Chart from './Chart' import Table from './reportTable' function DailyReport({Editdat}) { const [reportdata, setReport] = useState([]); const [todayreport, settodayreport] = useState({ reportdate: "", Client: "", startEnd: "", Totalhrs: "", status: "", }); const handlechange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); settodayreport((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value, })); } const submitForm = () => { console.log('submitted'); console.log(todayreport); submitReport(todayreport); } useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:8000/testapi/v1/dailyreport') .then(res => res.json()) .then(res => setReport(res.data)) .catch(error => console.error('Error fetching report data:', error)); }, []); // Empty dependency array so this runs once on mount const submitReport = (todayreport) => { fetch('http://localhost:8000/testapi/v1/dailyreport/today', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify(todayreport) }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { console.log('Report submitted successfully:', data); setReport(reportdata => [...reportdata, data]); console.log(reportdata); alert('Report is Submitted') window.location.reload(); // Update state with the submitted report }) .catch(error => console.error('Error submitting report:', error)); } const onEdit = (report) => { // Populate the input fields with the report data setFormData(report); }; exports.editreport = async (req, res, next) => { try { const reportId = req.body.id; // Assuming you're sending the report ID in the request body const updatedData = req.body; // The new data to update the report with const data = await ReportModal.findOneAndUpdate({ _id: reportId }, updatedData, { new: true }); if (!data) { return res.status(404).json({ msg: 'Report not found', }); } res.json({ msg: 'Report updated successfully', data, }); } catch (error) { res.status(500).json({ msg: 'Error updating report', error: error.message, }); } }; return (
